message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this amazing product and I think it would be a great fit for you.  I'm offering it to you for $11,500.  Let me know what you think!
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. Could you consider that?
Bob, I appreciate your interest!  $9,000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a great deal for you, considering the value of the product.  Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,250. Can you consider that?
